channel.title: Alert Trigger: Date Value
channel.description:
Hello,
I'd like to create an alert based on the date to notify our team when a staff member has been terminated or resigned. However, I'm not familiar with the value being displayed for the date value trigger and I don't see it in the Alerts documentation. Would you be able to assist or point me in the direction on how to determine the correct date value?
![AlertDateValue|436x208](upload://8pO1dK6jsd3kcSrr9wh2rycMye3.png)
Thank You, Jess

item.title: Alert Trigger: Date Value
item.dc:creator: jbauer
item.description:
Hello,

I’d like to create an alert based on the date to notify our team when a staff member has been terminated or resigned. However, I’m not familiar with the value being displayed for the date value trigger and I don’t see it in the Alerts documentation. Would you be able to assist or point me in the direction on how to determine the correct date value?

Thank You,
Jess
